subject: JUnit and Eclipse
msgSnippet: I am new to Eclipse and JUnit, so please bare with me, and yes I know this is not an Eclipse site. Maybe someone out their uses Eclipse and can point me in the
messageBody:
I am new to Eclipse and JUnit, so please bare with me, and yes I
know this is not an Eclipse site. Maybe someone out their uses
Eclipse and can point me in the right direction.

I downloaded Eclipse and it appears to have JUnit as part of the
download. When I try to use JUnit as per the the "Eclipse in Action
Workbook" I do not get the results the book indicates. Basically I
can't get it to work. Also the release level of JUnit does not match
the book either.

I assume I should download the latest release of JUnit and install
it. Is their somewhere I can obtain install instructions for JUnit?

Thanks in advance for any help provided.

Jared
